sql: SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELCT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.non_existent_table` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELECT count(non_existent_column) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'
SELECT 100 AS numerator_value, 0 AS denominator_value, SAFE_DIVIDE(100, 0) AS metric_output, '{currently}' AS business_data_date
SELECT NULL AS numerator_value, NULL AS denominator_value, NULL AS metric_output, '{currently}' AS business_data_date
SELECT 1.0 AS numerator_value, 0.0 AS denominator_value, CAST('inf' AS FLOAT64) AS metric_output, '{currently}' AS business_data_date
SELECT 999999999999999999999999999999999999.999999999 AS metric_output, 999999999999999999999999999999999999.999999999 AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `restricted-project.restricted_dataset.restricted_table` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

WITH RECURSIVE slow_query AS (SELECT 1 as n UNION ALL SELECT n+1 FROM slow_query WHERE n < 1000000) SELECT COUNT(*) AS metric_output, COUNT(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM slow_query

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

WITH perm_count AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS perm_total FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'), non_perm_count AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS non_perm_total FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_non_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = {partition_info}) SELECT perm_count.perm_total AS numerator_value, perm_count.perm_total + non_perm_count.non_perm_total AS denominator_value, ROUND(SAFE_DIVIDE(perm_count.perm_total * 100.0, perm_count.perm_total + non_perm_count.non_perm_total), 2) AS metric_output, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM perm_count CROSS JOIN non_perm_count

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELECT invalid_function(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELECT 'not_a_number' AS metric_output, 'also_not_number' AS numerator_value, 'still_not_number' AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}' LIMIT 1

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = AND '{currently}'

SELECT count(*) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` a JOIN `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.non_existent_table` b ON a.non_existent_field = b.another_non_existent_field WHERE a.partition_dt = '{currently}'

SELECT count(DISTINCT employee_id) AS metric_output, count(*) AS numerator_value, 1 AS denominator_value, '{currently}' AS business_data_date FROM `ap-peocon-bld-01-2478.ap_peocon_bld_01_bqd_euwe2_headcount.reportable_perm_employees` WHERE partition_dt = '{currently}' AND employee_id IS NULL
